# Media City Dubai

Media City Dubai is the premier digital ecosystem and hub for media, adtech, and events in Dubai.
This website serves as a community platform, events directory, and tool repository for industry professionals.

## Key Sections
- /forum: Engaging discussions on Industry News, Tech Support, Career Advice, and General Discussion.
- /events: Curated calendar of upcoming conferences, workshops, and networking mixers happening in Dubai.
- /tools: Essential industry solutions categorized by tech area such as AI Tools and AdTech.
- /about: Information about the Media City Dubai platform.
